scripts.test: yarn test:chromium && yarn test:firefox && yarn test:webkit
scripts.test:chromium: cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=mobile yarn test.e2e:chromium && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=smallTablet yarn test.e2e:chromium && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=tablet yarn test.e2e:chromium && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=desktop yarn test.e2e:chromium
scripts.test:firefox: cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=mobile yarn test.e2e:firefox && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=smallTablet yarn test.e2e:firefox && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=tablet yarn test.e2e:firefox && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=desktop yarn test.e2e:firefox
scripts.test:webkit: cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=mobile yarn test.e2e:webkit && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=smallTablet yarn test.e2e:webkit && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=tablet yarn test.e2e:webkit && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=desktop yarn test.e2e:webkit
scripts.test:model: yarn test:chromium:model && yarn test:firefox:model && yarn test:webkit:model
scripts.test:chromium:model: cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=mobile MODEL=true yarn test.e2e:chromium && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=smallTablet MODEL=true yarn test.e2e:chromium && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=tablet MODEL=true yarn test.e2e:chromium && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=desktop MODEL=true yarn test.e2e:chromium
scripts.test:firefox:model: cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=mobile MODEL=true yarn test.e2e:firefox && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=smallTablet MODEL=true yarn test.e2e:firefox && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=tablet MODEL=true yarn test.e2e:firefox && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=desktop MODEL=true yarn test.e2e:firefox
scripts.test:webkit:model: cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=mobile MODEL=true yarn test.e2e:webkit && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=smallTablet MODEL=true yarn test.e2e:webkit && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=tablet MODEL=true yarn test.e2e:webkit && cross-env DEVICE_TYPE=desktop MODEL=true yarn test.e2e:webkit
